text: @PresidencyZA I have a strong feeling that the cigarettes burn will spread the covid19... here's how. I was waiting 4bus with5 guys one gent walked pass the bus stop assume he was going to work. He was smoking then 1of the 5 asked 4his smoke and guy gave it to him  and 5 strangers shared.
